Q: I bought something in the shop, but I havent received it in-game yet?
A: It can take up to 15 minutes for everything to sync up. If it has been over 30 minutes, submit a ticket in the ticket channel or by sending Marvin a DM with m.ticket new [content].

Q: What if I buy something in the shop, but I am not logged into the server?
A: Ranks will still be applied, even if you are offline. Crate keys become virtual. Just go up to the crate and right click it and it will work.

Q: How can I link my Discord and Minecraft account for the Voyager rank?
A: While on our server, type `/discord link` and you will recieve a code that you will need to send to Eve in a Discord direct message. That's it.
